@pixi/utils > PIXI > utils > CanvasRenderTarget

PIXI.utils.CanvasRenderTarget 

class CanvasRenderTarget

Creates a Canvas element of the given size to be used as a target for rendering to.

Constructor

new PIXI.utils.CanvasRenderTarget(width: number, height: number, resolution: number) â†’ {}
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
width number

the width for the newly created canvas
height number

the height for the newly created canvas
resolution number

<optional>

 PIXI.settings.RESOLUTION

The resolution / device pixel ratio of the canvas

Summary

Properties from CanvasRenderTarget

HTMLCanvasElement
canvas

The Canvas object that belongs to this CanvasRenderTarget.
CanvasRenderingContext2D
context

A CanvasRenderingContext2D object representing a two-dimensional rendering context.
number
height

The height of the canvas buffer in pixels.
number
resolution = 1
number
width

The width of the canvas buffer in pixels.

Destroys this canvas.
